title: n00dInteract
description: Need to enrich your project with versatile interactions? Look no further than n00dInteract! This plugin makes it easy to integrate a broad range of interactive functionalities, offering both simplicity and depth to enhance your game's interactivity.
longDescription:
n00dInteract: Versatile Interaction Framework for Dynamic Game Elements


Demonstration 📹

Project Integration 📹

Creating Interactables 📹


Unleash the full potential of in-game interactions with n00dInteract, a fully network-replicated component designed to handle a wide array of interaction scenarios with ease and precision. This plug-and-play solution is authoritative, ensuring consistent and reliable interaction across all players.


Key Features:


  • Diverse Interaction Types: Supports four main interaction types—InteractByOverlap, InteractOverlap, OverlapWithTrace, and TraceOnly—covering a broad spectrum of interaction implementations.
  • Conditional Handling: Manages all conditions under which interactions are allowed, ensuring gameplay integrity and logic consistency.
  • Easy Integration: A single component that attaches seamlessly to any interactable object, enhancing flexibility and ease of use.
  • Hint Text Feature: Provides hint texts for overlapping interactables, guiding players and enhancing user experience.
  • Dynamic Event Binding: Allows the component to bind to other actors, responding to interaction events dynamically.
  • Extensive Examples: Comes with exhaustive examples that extend off content examples, all multiplayer-ready and demonstrating the component’s functionalities.


Limitless Possibilities

With n00dInteract, your creativity sets the boundaries. Whether crafting complex puzzles, interactive environments, or innovative gameplay mechanics, this component powers your visions into reality.


Integrated with n00dWorkshop Suite

As part of the n00dWorkshop suite, n00dInteract benefits from seamless integration with other n00d assets, enhancing consistency and streamlining development processes across your projects.


Elevate your game’s interactivity with n00dInteract—where every interaction is an opportunity for innovation.


Orbital Marketplace

  • Linux

technicalDetails:
YOU DO NOT NEED TO KNOW C++ TO USE THIS PLUGIN! ALL N00D PLUGINS ARE BLUEPRINT-FIRST, C++ WHERE REQUIRED!



Code Modules:

  • Runtime

 

Number of Blueprints: 5 (excluding examples)

Number of C++ Classes: 1 (Project Settings)

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux
